com.oracle.truffle.tools.agentscript

Class FrameLibrary.Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.truffle.tools.agentscript.FrameLibrary.Query
  • Enclosing class:
    FrameLibrary

    public final class FrameLibrary.Query
extends Object
    Holds location, environment, etc. Used to provide necessary information for implementation of individual FrameLibrary messages like FrameLibrary.collectNames(com.oracle.truffle.tools.agentscript.FrameLibrary.Query, java.util.Set) and co.
    Since:
    20.1
